plays.text: Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht assisted by Riku Hahl and Greg de Vries
Penalty to Rob Blake 2 minutes for Crosschecking Pierre Turgeon
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Patrick Roy
Goal scored by Jere Lehtinen assisted by Mike Modano and Darryl Sydor
Penalty to John Erskine 2 minutes for Holding Eric Messier
Penalty to Derian Hatcher 2 minutes for Slashing Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Peter Forsberg 2 minutes for Slashing Derian Hatcher
Penalty to Derian Hatcher 5 minutes for Fighting Adam Foote
Penalty to Adam Foote 5 minutes for Fighting Derian Hatcher
Penalty to Greg de Vries 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
